artist: Artist: Alexander Calder; Author: Mario Pedrosa; Publisher: Maeght Éditeur, Paris
description: paper periodical with title across top; author name across bottom; white cover with image of black silhouette of figure; PR arm raised, PL arm lowered; three legs with a pointed head; lender's archive #126

medium: Color lithographs, illustrations in black and white and color; letterpress
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: Derrière le Miroir, No. 212
